ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Necromancers] Expansion Spells
ygData.msgSnippet: The Vampirism spell would be really cool -- I d like to see some new pets though.  I m talking about differing types, like demons, ghouls, zombies, undead
ygData.messageBody:
The Vampirism spell would be really cool -- I'd like to see some new pets
though. I'm talking about differing types, like demons, ghouls, zombies, undead
dracoliches. You know -- the usual. Make them research and high level -- they
have the same affect as the other pets, just look different. I'd run from a
Necro with a 10' tall spikey-horned leather-winged demon walking behind him that
said
"<name> is my master."

Just an idea :P

Jason Brown
TeleVox Software, Inc.
(800)706-0459
